title: (x) Serif typeface used in Dutch graphic design magazine "items" - Collis {Arena}
content:
Can anyone name this one for me?

Kevin

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [items font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=items%20font.jpg) | 82.19 KB |
author: kvdl

comments.content: Looks like a Zapf.. can’t quite place it, though..

That’s the beautiful Collis from The Enschedé Font Foundry.  
 [http://www.teff.nl/fonts/collis/collis.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111042144/http:/www.teff.nl/fonts/collis/collis.html)

That is one hell of a typeface, isn’t it? I’m jelous I didn’t make it.

®

**Also tired of Helvetica?** Get an **[Insider](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111042144/http:/www.characters.nl/)** with more personality
